metadata.title: CVE-2019-15052 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The HTTP client in Gradle before 5.6 sends authentication credentialsoriginally destined for the configured host. If that host returns a 30xredirect, Gradle also sends those credentials to all subsequent hosts thatthe request redirects to. This is similar to CVE-2018-1000007.

criterions.comment: gradle package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
